title: Olive Wood Serving / Salad Spoons (Set of 2)
description: It is easy to appreciate these gorgeous and highly functional wooden utensils. The rich color and interesting veins are characteristic of the beautiful Olive Wood. Because it is a hardwood, it will not scratch, stain, or absorb flavors and odors, making it very hygienic. Includes a set of 2-Serving Spoons. Wash by hand in warm soapy water. These spoons were made from trees that were grown to harvest olives. Only when the trees could no longer produce olives were they used for the production of these utensils.Includes a set of 2 olive wood serving spoonsIdeal for cooking and servingBeautiful rich color and interesting vein designSafe for use with non-stick cookwareTight wood structure does not absorb odors or flavorsAmong the most hygienic woods for use with foodHand wash
